original_text: Then Hezekiah the king rose early, and gathered the rulers of the city, and went up to the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 히스기야 왕이 일찍이 일어나 성읍의 귀인들을 모아 여호와의 전에 올라가서

sentences.original_text: Then Hezekiah the king rose early
and gathered the rulers of the city
and went up to the house of the Lord
